feed.title: Huntarr Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 7.0.9
entry.content:
What's Changed

Fixed scheduler (note v6 saved items to /config and v7 saves to /config/settings

New Contributors

Full Changelog: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/compare/7.0.7...7.0.9 * Add Apprise notification support by @copilot-swe-agent in https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/pull/479

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 7.1.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

Fixed the scheduler and state management. If your on 7.0.0 to 7.0.9, please update or your older processed items will never reprocess. This was due to a move to support windows/mac

  • Dev by @Admin9705 in https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/pull/493 Full Changelog: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/compare/7.0.9...7.1.0

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 7.1.3
entry.content:
• Recognize Sponsors of the Project and changed link for GitHub Donates
  • When Huntarr loads on the home page, it would flicker with stale data for .5 of a second. No longer does it (smoother load up).

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 7.1.4
entry.content:
• New High Resolution Icons
  • Fixed a glitch on the settings page. When you saved, it would always assume you changed the authentication method and force you back to the home page (saved always worked). Now, if you change anything other than authentication, it will save and leave you on the same page
  • Marked appraisal notifications for not working yet
